cf.lukasheinzl.mc.api.inventory

Class APIItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • cf.lukasheinzl.mc.api.inventory.APIItem

  • public class APIItem
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents an item.
    Author:
    Lukas Heinzl

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      APIItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is)
      Constructs a new APIItem representing the given ItemStack.
      APIItem(org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack is, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new APIItem representing the given ItemStack and with the given display name.
      APIItem(org.bukkit.Material type, int amount)
      Constructs a new APIItem of the given type and amount.
      APIItem(org.bukkit.Material type, int amount, java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new APIItem of the given type and amount and with the given display name.
